00005 struct Node {
00006         int label;
00007         int h;
00008         int area;
00009         struct Node *father;
00010         std::vector<long int > pixels;
00011         std::vector<struct Node *> childs; 
00012         
00013         bool active;
00014         };
00015 
00016 typedef struct Node tNode;
00017 
00018 using std::vector;
00019 
00021 vector <long int> merge_pixels(tNode *tree)
00022 {
00023         
00024         vector <long int> res;
00025         
00026         std::queue <struct Node *> fifo;
00027         fifo.push(tree);
00028         while(!fifo.empty() )
00029                 {
00030                 tNode *tmp=fifo.front();
00031                 fifo.pop();
00032                 for(int i=0; i<tmp->pixels.size(); i++)
00033                         res.push_back(tmp->pixels[i]);
00034                 for(int i=0; i<tmp->childs.size(); i++)
00035                         {
00036                         fifo.push(tmp->childs[i]);
00037                         }
00038                 }
00039         
00040         return res;
00041 }
00042 
00048 
00049 void filterArea(tNode *root, int area)
00050 {
00051         if(root!=NULL)
00052                 {
00053                 std::queue <struct Node *> fifo;
00054                 fifo.push(root);
00055                 while(!fifo.empty() )
00056                         {
00057                         tNode *curNode=fifo.front();
00058                         fifo.pop();
00059                         
00060                         if(curNode->area <= area)       
00061                                 //we "cut" the subtree
00062                                 {
00063                                 vector <long int> subPixels=merge_pixels(curNode);
00064                                 
00065                                 for(int i=0; i< subPixels.size(); i++)
00066                                         curNode->father->pixels.push_back(subPixels[i]);
00067                                 
00068                                 assert(curNode->father!=0);
00069                                 
00070                                 
00071                                 curNode->childs.clear();
00072                                 curNode->active=false;
00073                                         
00074                                 }
00075                         
00076                         else
00077                         for(int i=0; i<curNode->childs.size(); i++)
00078                                 {
00079                                 fifo.push(curNode->childs[i]);
00080                                 }
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083 }
00084 
00085 void printTree(tNode *tree)
00086 {
00087         if(tree!=NULL)
00088                 {
00089                 std::queue <struct Node *> fifo;
00090                 fifo.push(tree);
00091                 while(!fifo.empty() )
00092                         {
00093                         tNode *tmp=fifo.front();
00094                         fifo.pop();
00095                         std::cout << "Node: C(" << tmp->h << "," << tmp->label << ")\n"; 
00096                         std::cout << "Area= " << tmp->area << "\n";
00097                         if(tmp->father==0)
00098                                 std::cout << "Father= " << 0 << "\n";
00099                         else std::cout << "Father= " << "C(" << tmp->father->h << "," << tmp->father->label <<   ")\n";
00100                         std::cout << "Childs: \n";
00101                         for(int i=0; i<tmp->childs.size(); i++)
00102                                 {
00103                                 std::cout << "\t\t C(" << tmp->childs[i]->h << "," << tmp->childs[i]->label << ")\n" ;
00104                                 fifo.push(tmp->childs[i]);
00105                                 }
00106                         std::cout << "\n\n"; 
00107                         }
00108                 }
00109 }
00110 
00111 void make_father(tNode ***index, int label1, int label2, int h1, int h2)
00112 {
00113         tNode *node=index[h1][label1];
00114         if(node==NULL) {
00115                 std::cout << "Big Error!\n";
00116                 exit(-1);
00117                 }
00118         //std::cout << "Node: " << h1 << " " <<label1<< "\n";
00119         //std::cout << node->h << " " << node->label << "\n";
00120         tNode *res=new struct Node;
00121         res->label=label2;
00122         res->h=h2;
00123         res->father=node;
00124         
00125         //std::cout << "New node: " << h2 << " " <<label2<< "\n";
00126         //std::cout << res->h << " " << res->label << "\n";
00127         
00128         node->label=label1;
00129         node->h=h1;
00130         node->childs.push_back(res);
00131                 
00132         index[h2][label2]=res;
00133         //std::cout << "Insertion: "<< h2 << " " << label2  << "\n";
00134 }       
00135 
00136 tNode *init_tree(void)
00137 {
00138         tNode *res=new struct Node;
00139         //std::cout << "Size of struct: " << sizeof(struct Node) << "\n";
00140         //std::cout << "Size of struct: " << sizeof(res->h) << " " << sizeof(res->label) 
00141         //<< " " << sizeof(res->father) << " " << sizeof(res->childs) << " " << sizeof(res->pixels) <<"\n";
00142         res->label=-1;
00143         res->h=-1;
00144         res->area=0;
00145         res->father=NULL;
00146         
00147         
00148         return res;
00149 }

00154 inline Image <U8> reconstructImage(tNode *tree, const TSize *size)
00155 {
00156         Image <U8> res(size);
00157         res.fill(0);
00158         
00159         if(tree!=NULL)
00160                 {
00161                 std::queue <struct Node *> fifo;
00162                 fifo.push(tree);
00163                 while(!fifo.empty() )
00164                         {
00165                         tNode *tmp=fifo.front();
00166                         fifo.pop();
00167                         if(tmp->active==true)
00168                                 {
00169                                 for(std::vector<long int>::iterator it=tmp->pixels.begin(); it!=tmp->pixels.end(); ++it)
00170                                         {
00171                                         res(*it)=tmp->h;
00172                                         }
00173                                 for(int i=0; i<tmp->childs.size(); i++)
00174                                         {
00175                                         
00176                                         fifo.push(tmp->childs[i]);
00177                                         }
00178                                 }
00179                         }
00180                 }
00181                 
00182         
00183         
00184         return res;
00185 }

00191 template <class T>
00192 tNode *computeComponentTree(Image <T> &im, FlatSE &se)
00193 {
00194         T hMax=im.getMax();
00195         T hMin=im.getMin();
00196         
00197         Image <T> tmp(im.getSize());
00198         Image <T> tmp2(im.getSize());
00199 
00200         Image <TLabel> Ch(im.getSize());
00201         Image <TLabel> TCh(im.getSize());
00202         
00203         int nbLevels=hMax+20;
00204         int maxCC=5000;
00205         
00206         tNode *tree=init_tree();
00207         tNode ***index=new struct Node**[nbLevels];
00208         for(int i=0; i<nbLevels; i++)   
00209                 index[i]=new struct Node *[maxCC];
00210         //std::cout << "Hmin= " << (int)hMin << "\n";
00211         index[hMin][1]=tree;
00212         //std::cout << "index: " << index[hMin][1]->h << " " << index[hMin][1]->label << "\n"; 
00213         //std::cout << "Tree: " << tree->h << " " << tree->label << "\n"; ;
00214         typedef std::vector <std::pair <int, TLabel> > tChildsList;
00215         typedef std::set <std::pair<TLabel,TLabel> > tEdgeSet; 
00216         tEdgeSet edgeSet;
00217         
00218         std::vector<long int> pixels;
00219         
00220         for(int h=hMin; h<=hMax; h++)
00221                 {
00222                 std::cout << "h= " << h << "\n";
00223                 tmp=im;
00224                 tmp2=im;
00225                 threshold(tmp,h,hMax);
00226                 threshold(tmp2,h+1,hMax);
00227         
00228                 Ch=labelConnectedComponents(tmp, se);
00229                 //std::cout << "Niveau: " << h << " nb CC: " << Ch.getMax() << "\n";
00230                 TCh=labelConnectedComponents(tmp2, se);
00231                 //std::cout << "Niveau: " << h+1 << " nb CC: " << TCh.getMax() << "\n";
00232                 for(int i=0; i<im.getBufSize(); i++)
00233                         {
00234                         if(Ch(i)!=0)
00235                                 {
00236                                 index[h][Ch(i)]->area++;
00237                                 }
00238                         if(Ch(i)!=0 && im(i)>h) //construct father/son relationship
00239                                 {
00240                                 edgeSet.insert(std::make_pair(Ch(i),TCh(i) ));
00241                                 }
00242                         if(Ch(i)!=0 && im(i)==h)
00243                                 {
00244                                 index[h][Ch(i)]->pixels.push_back(i);
00245                                 
00246                                 assert(h==im(i));
00247                                 }
00248                         }
00249                         
00250                 for(tEdgeSet::iterator it=edgeSet.begin(); it!=edgeSet.end(); ++it)
00251                         {
00252                         //std::cout << "Lien entre: C(" << h <<"," <<it->first<< ") et C("<< h+1 << ","<<it->second << ")\n";
00253                         make_father(index, it->first, it->second, h, h+1);
00254                         }
00255                 edgeSet.clear();
00256                 }
00257         std::cout << "Fin de la boucle\n";
00258         return tree;
00259 }
00260 
00261 void father(tNode *tree, tNode *child)
00262 {
00263         child->father=tree;
00264         tree->childs.push_back(child);
00265 }
00266 
00267 tNode *init_tree(int h, int n)
00268 {
00269         tNode *res=new struct Node;
00270         res->h=h;
00271         res->label=n;
00272         res->father=NULL;
00273         res->area=0;
00274         res->active=true;
00275         return res;
00276 }

00278 template <class T>
00279 tNode *computeComponentTreeBensMethod(Image <T> &im, FlatSE &se)
00280 {
00281         T hMax=im.getMax();
00282         T hMin=im.getMin();
00283         int bufSize=im.getBufSize();
00284         se.setContext(im.getSize() );
00285         
00286         std::map<int, std::queue <long int> > pixels;
00287         
00288         std::vector<bool> status(bufSize);
00289         for(int i=0; i<status.size(); i++) status[i]=0;
00290         
00291         int nbLevels=hMax+20;
00292         int maxCC=5000;
00293         
00294         tNode *tree;
00295         tNode ***index=new struct Node**[nbLevels];
00296         for(int i=0; i<nbLevels; i++)   
00297                 index[i]=new struct Node *[maxCC];
00298                 
00299         Image <bool> isProcessed(im.getSize());
00300         
00301         for(int i=0; i<bufSize; i++)
00302                 {
00303                 pixels[im(i)].push(i);
00304                 }
00305         
00306         for(int h=hMax; h>=hMin; h--)
00307                 {
00308                 int nCC=1;
00309                 while(!pixels[h].empty())
00310                         {
00311                         long int p=pixels[h].front();
00312                         pixels[h].pop();
00313                         
00314                         if(status[p]==0)
00315                                 {
00316                                 tNode *Chn=init_tree(h,nCC);
00317                                 index[h][nCC]=Chn;
00318                                 Chn->pixels.push_back(p);
00319                                 
00320                                 status[p]=nCC;
00321                                 
00322                                 isProcessed.fill(false);
00323                                 
00324                                 std::queue <long int> fifo;
00325                                 fifo.push(p);
00326                                 isProcessed(p)=true;
00327                                 while(!fifo.empty() )
00328                                         {
00329                                         long int q=fifo.front();
00330                                         fifo.pop();
00331                                         for (int i=0; i<se.getNbPoints(); i++)
00332                                                 {
00333                                                 long int r=q+se.getOffset(i);
00334                                                 
00335                                                 if(im.isPosValid(r))
00336                                                  if(isProcessed(r)==false)
00337                                                         {
00338                                                         isProcessed(r)=true;
00339                                                         if(im(r)>im(q))
00340                                                                 {
00341                                                                 fifo.push(r);
00342                                                                 std:: cout << "Pere (C(" << h << "," << nCC << ")=" << "C(" << (int)im(r) << "," << status[r] << ")\n";
00343                                                                 father(Chn, index[im(r)][status[r]]);
00344                                                                 }
00345                                                         if(im(r)==im(q))
00346                                                                 {
00347                                                                 status[r]=nCC;
00348                                                                 Chn->pixels.push_back(r);
00349                                                                 fifo.push(r);
00350                                                                 }
00351                                                         }
00352                                                 }
00353                                         
00354                                         }
00355                                 nCC++;
00356                                 }
00357                         
00358                         
00359                         }
00360                 }
00361         tree=index[hMin][1];
00362         return tree;
00363 }
00364 
00365 int computeArea(tNode *tree)
00366 {
00367         if(tree!=0)
00368                 {
00369                 if(tree->childs.size()!=0)
00370                         {
00371                         for(int i=0; i<tree->childs.size(); i++)
00372                                 {
00373                                  tree->area+=computeArea(tree->childs[i]);
00374                                 }
00375                         
00376                         }
00377                 return tree->area;
00378                 }
00379 }
00380 
00381 template <class T>
00382 int flood(Image <T> &im, std::map <int, std::queue<int> > &oq, int h,  int hMin,
00383 vector <int> &STATUS, vector <int> &number_nodes, vector <bool> &node_at_level, FlatSE &se, std::map <T, 
00384 std::map<TLabel, struct Node *> > &index )
00385 {
00386         //std::cout << "h= " << h << "\n";
00387         int m;
00388         while(!oq[h].empty())
00389                 {
00390                 int p=oq[h].front();
00391                 oq[h].pop();
00392                 //std::cout << "Point traité: " << p << " " << im(p) << "\n";
00393                 assert(number_nodes[h]>=0);
00394                 
00395                 STATUS[p]=number_nodes[h];
00396                 
00397                 if(index[h].count(STATUS[p])==0)
00398                         {
00399                         tNode *Chn=init_tree(h,STATUS[p]);
00400                         index[h][STATUS[p]]=Chn;
00401                         //std::cout << "Création du noeud C("<< h << "," << STATUS[p] << ")\n";
00402                         }
00403                 index[h][STATUS[p]]->pixels.push_back(p);
00404                 index[h][STATUS[p]]->area++;
00405                 
00406                 //struct NghbList *nghblist=im.getNghbList(p);
00407                 
00408                 for(int i=0; i<se.getNbPoints() ; i++)
00409                         {
00410                         int q=p+se.getOffset(i);
00411                         
00412                         if(im.isPosValid(q))
00413                                 {
00414                                 
00415                                 //std::cout << "Voisin: " << q << " " << im(q) << "\n";
00416                                 if(STATUS[q]==-2)
00417                                         {
00418                                         oq[im(q)].push(q);
00419                                         STATUS[q]=-1;
00420                                         node_at_level[im(p)]=true;
00421                                         node_at_level[im(q)]=true;
00422                                         
00423                                         if(im(q)>im(p))
00424                                                 {
00425                                                 
00426                                                 m=im(q);
00427                         
00428                                                 do      {
00429                                                         m=flood(im,oq,m,hMin,STATUS,number_nodes,node_at_level,se,index);
00430                                                         //std::cout << "m= " << m << "h= " << h << "\n";
00431                                                         if(m<h) exit(-1);
00432                                                         } while(m!=h);
00433                                                 }
00434                                         }
00435                                 }
00436                         }
00437                 }
00438         //End of recursion: we have reached a regional maximum
00439         number_nodes[h]=number_nodes[h]+1;
00440         
00441 
00442         m=h-1;
00443         while(m>=hMin && node_at_level[m]==false) m--;
00444         
00445         if(m>=hMin)
00446                 {
00447                 int i=number_nodes[h]-1;
00448                 int j=number_nodes[m];
00449                 if(index[m][j]==0)
00450                         {
00451                         //std::cout << "Redescente: Création du noeud C(" << m <<"," << j << ")\n";
00452                         index[m][j]=init_tree(m,j);
00453                         }
00454                 //std:: cout << "Pere (C(" << h << "," << i << ")=" << "C(" << m << "," << j << ")\n";
00455                                                                 
00456                 father(index[m][j],index[h][i]);
00457                 }
00458         
00459         //assert(h>=hMin && h < node_at_level.size());
00460         node_at_level[h]=false;
00461         return m;
00462 }

00523                                         }
00524                                 }
00525                         }
00526                 }

00528

00543                                                                 
00544                 father(index[m][j],index[h][i]);
00545                 }
00546         
00547         //assert(h>=hMin && h < node_at_level.size());
00548         node_at_level[h]=false;
00549         return m;
00550 }

00553 template <class T>
00554 tNode *computeComponentTree2V1(Image <T> &im, FlatSE &se)
00555 {       
00556         T hMax=im.getMax();
00557         T hMin=im.getMin();
00558         int bufSize=im.getBufSize();
00559         se.setContext(im.getSize() );
00560         
00561         tNode *tree;
00562         
00563         OrderedQueue <long int> fp;
00564         
00565         std::map <int, std::queue<int> > oq;
00566         
00567         std::map< T , std::map <TLabel, tNode *> > index;
00568         
00569         std::vector<int> STATUS(bufSize);
00570         for(int i=0; i<STATUS.size(); i++) STATUS[i]=-2;
00571         
00572         std::vector<int> number_nodes(hMax+1);
00573         std::vector<bool> node_at_level(hMax+1);
00574         for(int i=0; i<number_nodes.size(); i++)
00575                 {
00576                 number_nodes[i]=0;
00577                 node_at_level[i]=false;
00578                 }
00579         
00580         for(int i=0; i<im.getBufSize(); i++)
00581                         if(im(i)==hMin)
00582                                 {
00583                                 oq[hMin].push(i);
00584                                 break;
00585                                 }
00586         
00587         //node_at_level[hMin]=true;             
00588         flood(im,oq,hMin, hMin, STATUS, number_nodes, node_at_level, se,index);
00589         tree=index[hMin][0];
00590         
00591         computeArea(tree);
00592         
00593         for(int i=0; i<bufSize; i++)
00594                 if(STATUS[i]<0)
00595                         std::cout << "Point non traité: "<< i << "\n";
00596         for(int i=0; i<=hMax; i++)      if(oq[i].size() !=0) std::cout <<" File non vide \n";
00597         
00598         return tree;
00599 }

00603 template <class T>
00604 tNode *computeComponentTree2(Image <T> &im, FlatSE &se)
00605 {       
00606         T hMax=im.getMax();
00607         T hMin=im.getMin();
00608         int bufSize=im.getBufSize();
00609         se.setContext(im.getSize() );
00610         
00611         tNode *tree;
00612         
00613         OrderedQueue <long int> fp;
00614         
00615         std::map <int, std::queue<int> > oq;
00616         
00617         std::map< T , std::map <TLabel, tNode *> > index;
00618         
00619         std::vector<int> STATUS(bufSize);
00620         for(int i=0; i<STATUS.size(); i++) STATUS[i]=-2;
00621         
00622         std::vector<int> number_nodes(hMax+1);
00623         std::vector<bool> node_at_level(hMax+1);
00624         for(int i=0; i<number_nodes.size(); i++)
00625                 {
00626                 number_nodes[i]=0;
00627                 node_at_level[i]=false;
00628                 }
00629         
00630         for(int i=0; i<im.getBufSize(); i++)
00631                         if(im(i)==hMin)
00632                                 {
00633                                 oq[hMin].push(i);
00634                                 break;
00635                                 }
00636         
00637         //node_at_level[hMin]=true;             
00638         flood2(im,oq,hMin, hMin, STATUS, number_nodes, node_at_level, se,index);
00639         tree=index[hMin][0];
00640         
00641         computeArea(tree);
00642         
00643         for(int i=0; i<bufSize; i++)
00644                 if(STATUS[i]<0)
00645                         std::cout << "Point non traité: "<< i << "\n";
00646         for(int i=0; i<=hMax; i++)      if(oq[i].size() !=0) std::cout <<" File non vide \n";
00647         
00648         return tree;
00649 }
00650 
00653 }
